name: TiffUtils.Net
short_description: .Net implementation of the TIFF and GeoTIFF standards, as described in the formal specifications found in http://partners.adobe.com/public/developer/en/tiff/TIFF6.pdf and http://ltpwww.gsfc.nasa.gov/IAS/handbook/pdfs/geotiff_spec.pdf respectively.
